        public void testFiltersAfterSSLConnectionToUpstreamProxyFails()
                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Verifies the proper filters are invoked when an attempt to connect to an upstream chained proxy over SSL fails. (The proxyToServerConnectionFailed() filter method is particularly important.)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
